text: Jean-Pierre Schosteck (born 16 March 1942) is a French politician. He is mayor of Châtillonhttp://www.assemblee-nationale.fr/13/tribun/fiches_id/2708.asp and a member of The Republicans. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Paris Category:Rally for the Republic politicians Category:Rally for France politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Debout la France politicians Category:The Popular Right Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:French Senators of the Fifth Republic Category:Senators of Hauts-de- Seine Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Mayors of places in Île-de-France
title: Jean-Pierre Schosteck
